title: Get log messages for a transfer run
description: Retrieves all log messages produced during a specific BigQuery Data Transfer Service transfer run.

objective.narrative: A developer can programmatically fetch troubleshooting information for a data transfer. This is useful for building an automated alerting system that scans log messages for specific error patterns or for archiving transfer run history for audit purposes.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatatransfer_v1_datatransferservice_transferlogs_list
regionTags.title: Get log messages for a transfer run
regionTags.description: Retrieves all log messages produced during a specific BigQuery Data Transfer Service transfer run.
